thread.title: Travel delay warnings for Bank Holiday getaway
thread.title_full: Travel delay warnings for Bank Holiday getaway | Calendar - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Travel delay warnings for Bank Holiday getaway
text:
There is a warning of travel delays across our region as thousands of people join the bank holiday getaway. 50 thousand holidaymakers will use Leeds Bradford airport alone over the next few days - while our motorways could be choker as a result of Leeds festival and the Challenge Cup final. Matt Price reports.
Play video Last updated Sat 29 Aug 2015 Travel Hull sheffield York North Yorkshire lincolnshire Leeds south yorkshire East Yorkshire West Yorkshire North Lincolnshire
